external_games.name: Layton's Mystery Journey: Katrielle and the Millionaires' Conspiracy - Deluxe Edition Plus

name: Layton's Mystery Journey: Katrielle and the Millionaires' Conspiracy - Deluxe Edition Plus
summary: An updated edition of Layton's Mystery Journey: Katrielle and the Millionaires' Conspiracy - Deluxe Edition only available in Japan. It adds the option to change to the voice actors featured in the anime.
